text:
Hey team, looking to work with River Murphy for Domino's. Budget is approx $27,635 - need 3 x Pinterest pin, 1 x 15-second TikTok. 11 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 12 months. Start date: September 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $27,635 budget

Need to confirm: exclusivity period
